Shopping Mall.english: 1. I love going to the shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Amo andare al centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Me encanta ir al centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich gehe gerne ins Einkaufszentrum.

Shopping Mall.english: 2. The shopping mall is always crowded on weekends.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale è sempre affollato nei fine settimana.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial siempre está lleno los fines de semana.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum ist an Wochenenden immer überfüllt.

Shopping Mall.english: 3. Let's meet at the entrance of the shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Ci vediamo all'ingresso del centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Quedemos en la entrada del centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Treffen wir uns am Eingang des Einkaufszentrums.

Shopping Mall.english: 4. I need to buy new shoes from the shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Devo comprare delle nuove scarpe al centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Necesito comprar zapatos nuevos en el centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich muss neue Schuhe im Einkaufszentrum kaufen.

Shopping Mall.english: 5. Can you recommend any good shops in the shopping mall?
Shopping Mall.italian: Puoi consigliare dei negozi buoni nel centro commerciale?
Shopping Mall.spanish: ¿Puedes recomendar alguna tienda buena en el centro comercial?
Shopping Mall.german: Kannst du gute Geschäfte im Einkaufszentrum empfehlen?

Shopping Mall.english: 6. The shopping mall has a wide variety of clothing stores.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale ha una vasta gamma di negozi di abbigliamento.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial tiene una amplia variedad de tiendas de ropa.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum hat eine große Auswahl an Bekleidungsgeschäften.

Shopping Mall.english: 7. I prefer shopping at the mall rather than online.
Shopping Mall.italian: Preferisco fare shopping al centro commerciale piuttosto che online.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Prefiero comprar en el centro comercial en lugar de en línea.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich ziehe es vor, im Einkaufszentrum einzukaufen, anstatt online.

Shopping Mall.english: 8. The shopping mall has a food court with many different restaurants.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale ha una food court con molti ristoranti diversi.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial tiene una plaza de comidas con muchos restaurantes diferentes.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum verfügt über eine Food Court mit vielen verschiedenen Restaurants.

Shopping Mall.english: 9. I always get lost in this huge shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Mi perdo sempre in questo enorme centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Siempre me pierdo en este enorme centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich verlaufe mich immer in diesem riesigen Einkaufszentrum.

Shopping Mall.english: 10. Let's go shopping for groceries at the mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Andiamo a fare la spesa al centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Vamos a hacer la compra en el centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Lass uns im Einkaufszentrum Lebensmittel einkaufen gehen.

Shopping Mall.english: 11. The shopping mall is a great place to hang out with friends.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale è un ottimo posto per passare del tempo con gli amici.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial es un buen lugar para pasar el rato con amigos.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum ist ein großartiger Ort, um mit Freunden abzuhängen.

Shopping Mall.english: 12. I found a great deal on a dress at the shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Ho trovato un'ottima offerta su un vestito al centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Encontré una gran oferta en un vestido en el centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich habe im Einkaufszentrum ein tolles Angebot für ein Kleid gefunden.

Shopping Mall.english: 13. The shopping mall is my favorite place to go shopping.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale è il mio posto preferito per fare shopping.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial es mi lugar favorito para ir de compras.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum ist mein Lieblingsplatz zum Einkaufen.

Shopping Mall.english: 14. The shopping mall has a parking lot for customers.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale ha un parcheggio per i clienti.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial tiene un estacionamiento para los clientes.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum verfügt über einen Parkplatz für Kunden.

Shopping Mall.english: 15. I enjoy exploring different stores in the shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Mi piace esplorare diversi negozi nel centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Disfruto explorando diferentes tiendas en el centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich erkunde gerne verschiedene Geschäfte im Einkaufszentrum.

Shopping Mall.english: 16. The shopping mall is a great place for window shopping.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale è un ottimo posto per fare window shopping.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial es un buen lugar para hacer window shopping.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum ist ein großartiger Ort zum Bummeln.

Shopping Mall.english: 17. I'm looking for a gift for my mom at the shopping mall.
Shopping Mall.italian: Sto cercando un regalo per mia mamma al centro commerciale.
Shopping Mall.spanish: Estoy buscando un regalo para mi mamá en el centro comercial.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich suche ein Geschenk für meine Mutter im Einkaufszentrum.

Shopping Mall.english: 18. The shopping mall has a cinema where you can watch the latest movies.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale ha un cinema dove puoi guardare gli ultimi film.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial tiene un cine donde puedes ver las últimas películas.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum verfügt über ein Kino, in dem du die neuesten Filme sehen kannst.

Shopping Mall.english: 19. I often go to the shopping mall to grab a quick bite.
Shopping Mall.italian: Spesso vado al centro commerciale per mangiare qualcosa velocemente.
Shopping Mall.spanish: A menudo voy al centro comercial para comer algo rápido.
Shopping Mall.german: Ich gehe oft ins Einkaufszentrum, um mir schnell etwas zum Essen zu holen.

Shopping Mall.english: 20. The shopping mall is a popular destination for tourists.
Shopping Mall.italian: Il centro commerciale è una meta popolare per i turisti.
Shopping Mall.spanish: El centro comercial es un destino popular para los turistas.
Shopping Mall.german: Das Einkaufszentrum ist ein beliebtes Ziel für Touristen.
